00042 InetAddr::InetAddr() {
00043   HT_EXPECT(sizeof(sockaddr_in) == sizeof(InetAddr), Error::UNPOSSIBLE);
00044   memset(this, 0, sizeof(InetAddr));
00045 }
00046 
00047 InetAddr::InetAddr(const String &host, uint16_t port) {
00048   HT_EXPECT(sizeof(sockaddr_in) == sizeof(InetAddr), Error::UNPOSSIBLE);
00049   HT_EXPECT(initialize(this, host.c_str(), port), Error::BAD_DOMAIN_NAME);
00050 }
00051 
00052 InetAddr::InetAddr(const String &endpoint) {
00053   HT_EXPECT(sizeof(sockaddr_in) == sizeof(InetAddr), Error::UNPOSSIBLE);
00054   HT_EXPECT(initialize(this, endpoint.c_str()), Error::BAD_DOMAIN_NAME);
00055 }
00056 
00057 InetAddr::InetAddr(uint32_t ip32, uint16_t port) {
00058   HT_EXPECT(sizeof(sockaddr_in) == sizeof(InetAddr), Error::UNPOSSIBLE);
00059   initialize(this, ip32, port);
00060 }
00061 
00062 bool InetAddr::initialize(sockaddr_in *addr, const char *host, uint16_t port) {
00063   memset(addr, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00064   {
00065     struct hostent *he = gethostbyname(host);
00066     if (he == 0) {
00067       String errmsg = (String)"gethostbyname(\"" + host + "\")";
00068       herror(errmsg.c_str());
00069       return false;
00070     }
00071     memcpy(&addr->sin_addr.s_addr, he->h_addr_list[0], sizeof(uint32_t));
00072   }
00073   addr->sin_family = AF_INET;
00074   addr->sin_port = htons(port);
00075   return true;
00076 }
00077 
00078 Endpoint InetAddr::parse_endpoint(const char *endpoint, int default_port) {
00079   const char *colon = strchr(endpoint, ':');
00080 
00081   if (colon) {
00082     String host = String(endpoint, colon - endpoint);
00083     return Endpoint(host, atoi(colon + 1));
00084   }
00085   return Endpoint(endpoint, default_port);
00086 }
00087 
00088 bool InetAddr::initialize(sockaddr_in *addr, const char *addr_str) {
00089   Endpoint e = parse_endpoint(addr_str);
00090 
00091   if (e.port)
00092     return initialize(addr, e.host.c_str(), e.port);
00093 
00094   return initialize(addr, "localhost", atoi(addr_str));
00095 }
00096 
00097 bool InetAddr::initialize(sockaddr_in *addr, uint32_t haddr, uint16_t port) {
00098   memset(addr, 0 , sizeof(sockaddr_in));
00099   addr->sin_family = AF_INET;
00100   addr->sin_addr.s_addr = htonl(haddr);
00101   addr->sin_port = htons(port);
00102   return true;
00103 }
00104 
00105 String InetAddr::format(const sockaddr_in &addr, int sep) {
00106   // inet_ntoa is not thread safe on many platforms and deprecated
00107   const uint8_t *ip = (uint8_t *)&addr.sin_addr.s_addr;
00108   return Hypertable::format("%d.%d.%d.%d%c%d", (int)ip[0], (int)ip[1],
00109       (int)ip[2],(int)ip[3], sep, (int)ntohs(addr.sin_port));
00110 }
00111 
00112 const char *InetAddr::string_format(String &addr_str, const sockaddr_in &addr) {
00113   addr_str = InetAddr::format(addr);
00114   return addr_str.c_str();
00115 }
00116 
00117 String InetAddr::get_hostname() {
00118   struct utsname u;
00119   uname(&u);
00120   return u.nodename;
00121 }
00122 
00123 String &InetAddr::get_hostname(String &hostname) {
00124   hostname = get_hostname();
00125   return hostname;
00126 }

00128 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, const Endpoint &e) {
00129   out << e.host <<':'<< e.port;
00130   return out;
00131 }

00133 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, const sockaddr_in &a) {
00134   out << InetAddr::format(a);
00135   return out;
